# View personal home page

In this section we give an overview of your personal home page.


Once logged in you enter your personal home page, similar to the image below.

<center><img src="images/View_personal_page.png"></center>

On the personal home page you see the following tabs:\

  * `Projects`\
  * `Teams`\
  * `Library`\
  * `Activities`\
  * `Subscription`\


In the next section you learn how to __Explore__ public projects.
